Operation 'oauth2.tokeninfo' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, unclear_purpose, poor_ai_interpretability. Original description is extremely vague. Missing summary entirely. Added clarity about what the operation does (validates and retrieves token metadata), what inputs are expected (access token parameter), what is returned (token metadata including user ID, scope, expiration), and the use case for AI agents. This helps agents understand when to call this operation (token validation scenarios) and what to expect.

data.description_suggestion: Validates and retrieves metadata about an OAuth2 access token. Accepts an access token as input and returns token information including user ID, scope, expiration time, and token type. Useful for verifying token validity and permissions before making authorized API calls. Requires the access token to be provided as a parameter.
data.reasoning: Original description is extremely vague. Missing summary entirely. message: Operation 'oauth2.userinfo.get' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_context, poor_ai_interpretability. Original description lacks specificity and context. Missing summary entirely. Enhanced to clarify that this retrieves the authenticated user's profile (not arbitrary user info), specify authentication requirements (OAuth2), reference the Userinfo schema, and explain the typical use case in OAuth2 flows. This helps AI agents understand the authentication context and when to use this endpoint.

data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the profile information of the authenticated end-user. Requires OAuth2 authentication (implicit or authorization code flow). Returns a Userinfo object containing user details such as user ID, email, name, and profile picture URL. This is the standard endpoint for obtaining user identity information after successful OAuth2 authorization.
data.reasoning: Original description lacks specificity and context. Missing summary entirely. data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the profile information of the authenticated end-user using the v2 API endpoint. Requires OAuth2 authentication. Returns a Userinfo object containing user identity details such as user ID, email, name, and profile picture URL. This is the v2 version of the userinfo endpoint with improved API design. The '/me' path segment indicates the currently authenticated user.
